title: variant
description: An entry with Variant information from a MOD.

alleleId.description: The prefixed primary (MOD) ID for the variant.

primaryId.description: The prefixed primary (MOD) ID for the variant.

taxonId.description: The taxonId for the species of the gene entity.

variantDetail.description: variant type dictates recorded genomic location and sequence information, which is captured in a subschema for each type allowed.

consequence.description: the consequence of the mutation.  should be an ECO term

secondaryIds.description: Collection of MOD-specific IDs that have been merged into variant entity.

items.description: set of publications that support the genomic location annotation for this variant record.
